text: Amelio "Memè" Perlini (8 December 1947 - 5 April 2017) was an Italian actor and movie director. His debut movie as a director, Italian Postcards, was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1987 Cannes Film Festival. Perlini died in Rome on 5 April 2017, aged 69. He committed suicide, by jumping from the fifth floor of his house. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Suicides by jumping Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian movie directors
